sense.def:
To sell something
pomeni nekomu nekaj dati, ker nam za tisto da denar.

seg.quote: I hope to sell the house for £60,000.
He is going to sell me his car.

sense.def:
Kadar trgovina
sells a particular thing
, so v njej na prodaj določeni izdelki.

Kadar nekaj
sells for a particular price
, je na prodaj po določeni ceni.

seg.quote: These little books sell for 95p each.
...a pocket calculator selling at the same price.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sells
, ljudje tisto kupujejo v večjih količinah.

seg.quote: Their revolutionary jet did not sell well.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sells a product
, spodbuja kupce, da kupujejo določen izdelek.

seg.quote: Scandal and gossip is what sells newspapers.

sense.def:
Kadar trgovina
is sold out of something
ali
has sold out of something
, so v njej prodali vso zalogo blaga določene vrste, tako da ga ni več.

Kadar gledališka, kinematografska ali druga predstava
is sold out
, so bile vse vstopnice zanjo prodane.
